name: My Personal Profile
description: A basic personal profile page created using only HTML. It includes my name, interests, and a short introduction to who I am.

name: My Products
description: A styled HTML product registration form for beauty and skincare tools. It features fields for product name, brand, category, and compatibility, with a clean and soft aesthetic.

name: About Me Page
description: A soft, minimalist page that introduces who I am and what I love. Built using HTML and CSS, it reflects my calm personality and interest in web design.
